name: Planet Poacher
description:
Life has changed for this typical space explorer. You’ve been roaming space for years and have never encountered something like this. Finally making it towards an outer edge of the galaxy, you find yourself trapped, surrounded by a newly formed asteroid belt. Lucky for you, you’re not alone here, and there’s plenty you’ve yet to explore in the area. There’s a variety of planets blooming to life. They are a beautiful sight to behold from the outside…though wouldn’t it be fun to see what truly lies in their cores?

-----

GAMEPLAY

Avoid obstacles, escape or fight against enemy ships, discover new planets and life, DESTROY ANYTHING IN YOUR PATH!! See what else this area of space has to offer.

-----

CONTROLS 

  • Move your mouse to control direction of your ship
  • Hold right mouse button to boost forward 
  • Press left mouse button to fire projectiles
